title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Access
summary: As a caregiver, I want to access real-time health metrics from older adults so that I can monitor their well-being and respond promptly to any health issues.

title: Video Communication for Health Updates
summary: As a caregiver, I want to initiate and receive video calls with older adults so that I can effectively communicate about their health and well-being.

title: Medication Reminder Management
summary: As a caregiver, I want to set and adjust medication reminders for older adults so that they can receive timely notifications and maintain their medication schedules effectively.

title: User-Friendly Interface for Caregivers
summary: As a caregiver, I want an intuitive interface so that I can quickly access critical health information and perform necessary actions without complicated setup or training.

title: Privacy Settings Management
summary: As a Health IT Compliance Officer, I want older adults to set privacy preferences for data access so that caregivers can only view information as permitted by the user.

title: Incident Alert System
summary: As a caregiver, I want ALFRED to notify me of significant health incidents or anomalies detected in the older adult's health data so that I can respond promptly to ensure their safety and well-being.
